name: Ragdoll Responders
description:
This is a short humorous game about a floppy fireman saving some lives (or at least trying to). Drag,  kick, punch,  or do what ever you need to  get those ragdolls to the safe zone.  When you're a ragdoll life is hard and   this is the best you can hope  for. Saving one out of a hundred isn't bad , right?

It's  a physics    game similar to Human Fall Flat.  It was created in under 48 hours for the Utah Indie Games Jam, and I used Unity with the Active Physics Ragdoll   plug-in.  Hope you enjoy it!

Was made as a part of the Utah Indie Games Jam 2020     (Theme:   Local Superheroes)

NOTE: Even though this is a humorous take rescuing people, please know that I love our first responders in real life. They are true superheroes in my book.
